segments.text: I want to have a haircut .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please take a seat . Do you need a shampoo ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much is a regular haircut without shampoo ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And how much for haircut with shampoo ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Since it is , I need a haircut with shampoo .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , what shampoo do you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( 5 minutes later ) What sort of hairstyles do you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What hairstyle do you feel will look best on me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think a crew cut is the most suitable for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have the same idea as you .
segments.speaker: S2
